S04bsu026_u:3_0: ekasmin samaye bhagavān trāyastriṃśānāṃ devānāṃ madhye viharati sma pāṇḍukambalakalpe
S04bsu026_u:4_0: athāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ utthāyāsanāt ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā
S04bsu026_u:4_1: dakṣiṇaṃ jānuṃ merupṛṣṭhe 'vaṣṭabhya yena bhaganān tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat
S04bsu026_u:4_2: - ete hi bhagavan devāḥ caityanamaskriyāmaṇḍanāḥ etatpariṣanmaṇḍalapatitāḥ kathamapi
S04bsu026_u:4_3: brahmacaryapuṇyaprasavāḥ sadevake samārake sabrahmake loke saśramaṇabrāhmaṇaprajāsu
S04bsu026_u:4_4: bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇyaḥ upāsakopāsikāḥ subahulapuṇyaprasavāḥ bhagavato dharmadeśanāṃ yācante iti /
S04bsu026_u:6: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
S04bsu026_u:7: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
S04bsu026_u:9: yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati, sa tathāgataṃ paśyati /
S04bsu026_u:10_0: yaśca avalokiteśvara kulaputraḥ kuladuhitā vā śraddhāsamanvitaḥ apratiṣṭhite pṛthivīpradeśe
S04bsu026_u:10_1: āmalakamātraṃ caityaṃ sūcīmātraṃ bodhivṛkṣaṃ bakulapuṣpamātraṃ chatraṃ kṛtvā pratītyasamutpādadharmadhātugāthāṃ paṭhati,
S04bsu026_u:12: itaḥ pracyāvya maraṇakālaṃ kṛtvā brahmaloke utpadyate /
S04bsu026_u:13: tataḥ pracyāvya kālaṃ kṛtvā śuddhāvāsakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyāmutpadyate //
